long_description: Thule is always looking to raise the bar, but this time they've lowered it! The Hullavator kayak lift system brings the load platform down making it easy to load and unload a kayak. Gas-assist struts lift and lower 40 lbs. of the kayak's weight allowing a single person to load and unload the kayak. Reduces lift height required to load and unload a kayak by 40 inches. Reduces effort required to lift boat with gas-assist shocks that help raise the boat onto the vehicle roof. No need to reach top of vehicle to secure boat; strap it while in the down position. Integrated padded support protects boat surface. Lift system only requires approximately 25 inches of load bar space for mounting, leaving room for other accessories. Fits Thule and Yakima load bars. Includes lift system, integrated padded support, mounting hardware and all straps necessary to transport one kayak. Locks to load bar, (locks sold separately).
short_description: Thule is always looking to raise the bar, but this time they've lowered it! The Hullavator kayak lift system brings the load platform down making it easy to load and unload a kayak.
